roleset.name: make clean, empty
roleset.note: CLEANSE-V NOTES: arg numbering suggested by 'remove' et al. (from cleanse.01-v)
CLEANSING-N NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to cleanse.01. Cleanse.01 is a member of VN class cheat-10.6. Framed by Katie. (from cleansing.01-n)

example.name: all args
example.text: In the current mood of the Japanese people, journalists and even some industrialists, [[*] giving power to the Socialists]-1 might be good for the LDP, [*]-1 cleansing it of past sins.

example.name: Arg 2
example.text: Cleansing of the wound with alcohol is recommended.
